assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Givosiran_Initial_COVERAGE_CRITERIA_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Initiation Criteria: Reimbursement of givosiran should be restricted to patients with 4 or more attacks requiring either hospitalization, an urgent healthcare visit, or intravenous hemin in the year prior to the prescribing date. Renewal Criteria: A reduction in the annualized attack rate after 12 months of therapy compared to baseline. Prescribing Conditions: Prescription should be restricted to clinician experienced in the management of AHP. Givosiran should not be used in combination with prophylactic hemin.
